name: Covenant (renab)
description:
Play a witch born in the city of Lichtlinn,  where witchcraft is illegal and witches are hunted by the Saints. You and your teacher, Maria, have been called outside of the city to the countryside, where a man has grown desperate enough to reach out to the Covenant, a group of illegal witches, to try and get rid of the ghost haunting his home. 

It's your first time outside of the Covenant's protective walls, and you'll have to use your wits and observational skills to help you suss out why this ghost is haunting your client. Perhaps, then, you may be able to help it move on...

Or perhaps you won't.
